P R A K A S H B A R O T 
P   r   o   j   e   c   t       M   a   n   a   g   e   r   /   P   r   o   g   r   a   m M   a   n   a   g   e   r 
 
(201)741-4787      |     pbarot@gmail.com     |     U.S. Citizen     |     Linkedin.com/in/prakashbarot    |    Metro Atlanta, GA 
 
P R O F E S S I O N A L S U M M A R Y 
 
 
With over 20 years of progressive experience in the IT services industry, I have cultivated a strong track record of success across 
diverse sectors including Cloud Solutions, IT services, financial services and payment solutions . I excel in driving project success 
and leading cross-functional teams to achieve key program deliverables. My expertise spans the entire program delivery life cycle, 
encompassing  project  management  office  (PMO)  leadership,  POS  hardware  deployment, Cloud  deployments  and more.  I  am 
committed to delivering value to clients, nurturing relationships, and developing talent.

committed to delivering value to clients, nurturing relationships, and developing talent. 
 
PROFESSIONAL SKILLS:    O365 Migration | Cloud Solutions | POS Hardware/Rollout Deployment | Payment Transaction Services  
Issue/Risk  Management  |  Datacenter  Migration  |Active  Directory  Upgrade  |  RFP/SOW  Management 
Offshore Partner Integration  |  Change Management  | Stakeholder/Vendor Relations  |  Waterfall/Agile 
Methodology  |  Process Improvements  |   SDLC  |  Budget & Forecasting   
W O R K   E X P E R I E N C E 
 
 
 
Sr. Project Manager/Program Manager    
Insight , Remote | 09/2018 – 04/2024 
 
❖ Successfully delivered a diverse range of projects, encompassing various scopes, sizes, budgets, & technologies, including 
Cloud & Data Center transformations, O365 migrations, & AD upgrades, utilizing both Waterfall & Agile methodologies. 
❖ Managed  the  complete  project  lifecycle,  from  SOW  agreement  to  closure,  for  projects  ranging  from  $10K  to  over  $5M,

❖ Managed  the  complete  project  lifecycle,  from  SOW  agreement  to  closure,  for  projects  ranging  from  $10K  to  over  $5M, 
ensuring optimal budget utilization and timeline adherence. 
❖ Spearheaded  the client organization  of  O365  migrations & AD  upgrade  programs,  collaborating  with  cross-functional 
teams,  gathering  requirements,  identifying  stakeholders,  developing milestones,  creating schedules  to  ensure  projects 
remained on schedule and within budget. 
❖ Developed  comprehensive  project  documentation,  including  kick-off  decks,  project  plans,  communication  plans,  and 
change requests, for each project throughout its lifecycle. 
❖ Facilitated various project meetings, including weekly internal and customer-facing status meetings, Discovery & Design 
sessions, and Project hand-off sessions. 
❖ Implemented SCRUM agile methodology for migration projects, enabling daily stand-up meetings.

sessions, and Project hand-off sessions. 
❖ Implemented SCRUM agile methodology for migration projects, enabling daily stand-up meetings. 
❖ Collaborated with on & off-shore engineering teams, customers, & vendors to ensure project milestones remained on track. 
❖ Ensured transparency and effective communication by providing weekly executive summary dashboards 
❖ Maintained alignment between project milestones, deliverables, and timelines, preventing project scope creep. 
❖ Performed budget & forecasting management tasks, monitoring project actuals/hours against estimates. 
❖ Cultivated strong customer relationships, leading to the acquisition of multiple additional projects with the same customer. 
❖ Conducted final project closure meetings with customers, providing final project deliverables and closure documents. 
 
PMO Lead   
Brighter Brain Inc, Sandy Springs | 01/2018  - 06/2018

❖ Conducted final project closure meetings with customers, providing final project deliverables and closure documents. 
 
PMO Lead   
Brighter Brain Inc, Sandy Springs | 01/2018  - 06/2018 
 
❖ Directed  E2E  project  management  support  for  18  projects,  each  valued  between  $500K-$1M,  utilizing  the  Waterfall 
methodology to track dependencies and key deliverables. 
❖ Liaised effectively  with  IT  and  business  groups  to  develop  comprehensive  project  plans,  coordinating  efforts  and 
assessing/mitigating impacts. 
❖ Collaborated with the VP of Operations to propagate, implement, standardize, and promote best practices in Waterfall and 
Agile methodologies among 15 project managers globally. 
❖ Implemented Agile methodology for daily stand-up meetings, efficiently delegating daily tasks to engineers for streamlined 
progress tracking. 
❖ Strategically  planned & assigned  resources  to  associated  projects  based  on  client  requests,  ensuring  optimal  project

progress tracking. 
❖ Strategically  planned & assigned  resources  to  associated  projects  based  on  client  requests,  ensuring  optimal  project 
outcomes.

P R A K A S H   B A R O T 
 
 
Hardware Implementation Project Manager 
Ingenico Group, Alpharetta | 06/2015 – 12/2017 
 
❖ Orchestrated the successful deployment of 30,000+ POS devices across diverse client locations, collaborating closely with 
internal/external stakeholders, third-party contractors, and the project team. 
❖ Conducted market visits with regional client leads to assess hardware deployment needs and services required, ensuring 
alignment with client expectations. 
❖ Led the implementation of EVM software using Agile methodology, working closely with vendors, clients, and technical teams 
to ensure seamless integration. 
❖ Provided on-site training and technical support during POS deployment/rollout (~8k retail locations), coordinating effectively 
with hardware engineers and business leads to resolve issues promptly. 
❖ Collaborated with clients during the proposal process to identify business needs and create RFP/SOW at an early stage of

with hardware engineers and business leads to resolve issues promptly. 
❖ Collaborated with clients during the proposal process to identify business needs and create RFP/SOW at an early stage of 
project initiation, offering fair and reasonable pricing based on client budget constraints. 
❖ Mentored junior team members in device installations, overseeing project delivery from inception to completion, including 
planning, scheduling, deployment, monitoring, and closure. 
❖ Conducted daily SCRUM meetings with the project team to ensure all projects met daily and weekly deadlines, maintaining 
a high level of accountability and progress tracking. 
❖ Contributed to the definition of quality assurance metrics and the rollout of KPI tracking across the Information Technology 
PM team, enhancing project performance and delivery standards. 
❖ Created installation technical documentation adhering to SBOM (Bill of Materials) for POS device delivery, ensuring accuracy

PM team, enhancing project performance and delivery standards. 
❖ Created installation technical documentation adhering to SBOM (Bill of Materials) for POS device delivery, ensuring accuracy 
and consistency in project execution. 
Project Manager  
Brighter Brain Inc, Sandy Springs | 04/2013 – 06/2015 
 
❖ Managed a team of 30 on-site consultants, overseeing their projects on various technology platforms such as iOS, Android, 
SharePoint, and Exchange, ensuring successful project delivery. 
❖ Directed  a  team  of  9  offshore  PM/support  resources,  with  overall  accountability  for  resource  planning,  utilization, 
optimization, and allocation, ensuring efficient project execution. 
❖ Utilized  project  scheduling  and  control  tools  to  track  project  plans,  work  hours,  budgets,  and  expenditures,  maintaining 
project timelines and budgets.

❖ Utilized  project  scheduling  and  control  tools  to  track  project  plans,  work  hours,  budgets,  and  expenditures,  maintaining 
project timelines and budgets. 
❖ Categorized  major  milestones  and  ensured  delivery within  the  timeline,  monitoring  client  methodologies and  escalating 
issues/risks as necessary to the executive team for prompt resolution. 
❖ Created complex pivot tables and charts to integrate within SharePoint for team use, enabling effective tracking of project 
volume and progress 
Project Manager 
NCR Corp, Alpharetta | 11/2012 – 02/2013 
 
❖  Created  and  managed  project  timeline  utilizing  MS  Project  for  the  conversion  of  POS  products  along  with  third  party 
products from Radiant to NCR 
❖ Acted as a liaison between Engineers, Product Managers and Manufacturing team to complete tasks/milestones according 
to timelines

products from Radiant to NCR 
❖ Acted as a liaison between Engineers, Product Managers and Manufacturing team to complete tasks/milestones according 
to timelines 
❖ Classified engineering project interdependencies and milestones utilizing NCR methodology and escalated issues/risks as 
necessary to PMO team 
❖ Facilitated daily Agile stand-up meeting to track project burndown and iteration status 
❖ Proactively  anticipated  upcoming  projects  and  needs  of  manager  by  prioritizing,  communicating  and  balancing  the 
workflow; took initiative in taking ownership of all projects through completion 
 
E D U C A T I O N   
 
Bachelors of Science in Management Information Systems                    2010 – 2012 
New Jersey Institute of Technology, New Jersey 
Diploma in Electronics, Computer Applications and Network Tech      1997 – 1998 
Computer Learning Center, New Jersey
